## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published in downstream modules

### Testing

- [ ] All tests pass (`npm run test:run`)
- [ ] Type checking passes (`npm run typecheck`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for public APIs
- [ ] I have updated relevant guides (USER_GUIDE.md, DEVELOPER_GUIDE.md)

### Accessibility

- [ ] I have tested keyboard navigation
- [ ] I have verified screen reader compatibility
- [ ] I have ensured color contrast meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards
- [ ] I have added appropriate ARIA labels

### Performance

- [ ] I have considered the bundle size impact
- [ ] I have tested with large datasets (if applicable)
- [ ] I have optimized expensive operations
- [ ] I have verified no memory leaks

## Additional Notes

<!-- Any additional information that reviewers should know -->

## Reviewer Checklist

<!-- For reviewers to check off -->

- [ ] Code follows project conventions
- [ ] Tests are comprehensive and pass
- [ ] Documentation is clear and complete
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Performance impact is acceptable
- [ ] Accessibility requirements met
